page.title: 11WATERSIDE INN
page.content: The Waterside Inn is a privately owned modern hotel,set in a beautiful roadside location,one mile from Peterhead.The hotel was opened on the 17th of January 1979.It has 110 rooms which are very comfortable.There are many leisure activities in the hotel eg.sauna,spa bath,sunbed,jacuzzi,gym, 2 snooker tables,crazy golf,table tennis and a swimming pool is being planned for the future.The hotel can be used for weddings,functions and conferences.The Grill Room Restaurant is small and intimate and has achieved a high reputation with its wide range of International,Scottish and French cuisine.The staff at the hotel are very polite and helpful.The Waterside Inn has a good trade and lots of business men come to stay at the hotel.The hotel can be hired for private functions.
